document.discussion_title: Philadelphia’s Jewelers Row Threatened, Reports Say
document.topic_text: Philadelphia’s Jewelers Row Threatened, Reports Say Rob, thank you so much for reporting on this and sharing the petition. I have friends that work on jeweler’s row, and everyone is very worried. The petition is almost at 3,000 signatures, let’s keep it going! Link:
document.post: Philadelphia’s Jewelers Row Threatened, Reports Say Rob, thank you so much for reporting on this and sharing the petition. I have friends that work on jeweler’s row, and everyone is very worried. The petition is almost at 3,000 signatures, let’s keep it going! Link:
